summary:
The Security Council,
Recalling all its relevant resolutions, including resolution 1808 of 15 April 2008,
Taking note of the reports of the Secretary-General of 23 July 2008 (S/2008/480) and 3 October 2008 (S/2008/631),
Decides to extend the mandate of the United Nations mission for a new period terminating on 15 February 2009;
Decides to remain actively seized of the matter.
